tool.name: SAGA.ta_channels.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False isArraySINKROUTE False isArrayINIT_GRID False isArrayDIV_GRID False isArrayTRACE_WEIGHT False output_data_CHNLNTWRK $output_data_CHNLNTWRK output_data_CHNLROUTE $output_data_CHNLROUTE output_data_SHAPES $output_data_SHAPES name SAGA.ta_channels.0 ELEVATION $ELEVATION SINKROUTE $SINKROUTE INIT_GRID $INIT_GRID INIT_METHOD $INIT_METHOD INIT_VALUE $INIT_VALUE DIV_GRID $DIV_GRID DIV_CELLS $DIV_CELLS TRACE_WEIGHT $TRACE_WEIGHT MINLEN $MINLEN prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CHNLNTWRK $OutputSection_CHNLNTWRK.outputType_CHNLNTWRK transmissionMode_CHNLNTWRK $OutputSection_CHNLNTWRK.transmissionMode_CHNLNTWRK outputType_CHNLROUTE $OutputSection_CHNLROUTE.outputType_CHNLROUTE transmissionMode_CHNLROUTE $OutputSection_CHNLROUTE.transmissionMode_CHNLROUTE outputType_SHAPES $OutputSection_SHAPES.outputType_SHAPES transmissionMode_SHAPES $OutputSection_SHAPES.transmissionMode_SHAPES

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: A grid that contains elevation data. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: SINKROUTE
param.label: Flow Direction
param.help: An optional grid that provides information about flow directions. <br/>Values between 1 to 8 force the flow of a cell to be given to one its adjacent neighbor cells (1->NE, 2->E, 3->SE, 4->S, 5->SW, 6->W, 7->NW, 8->N). In case of other values the algorithm will use its own routing scheme. <br/>This option is in particular useful to supply the algorithm with routes that lead the flow through closed depression. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: INIT_GRID
param.label: Initiation Grid
param.help: Dependent on the chosen 'Initiation Type' and 'Initiation Threshold' the values of this grid control where a channel is initiated. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: INIT_METHOD
param.label: Initiation Type
param.help: Options:<br/> - Less than<br/> - Equals<br/> - Greater than<br/>Controls under which condition a channel is initiated.

param.name: INIT_VALUE
param.label: Initiation Threshold
param.help: Dependent on the chosen 'Initiation Grid' and 'Initiation Type' this value controls under which condition a channel is initiated.

param.name: DIV_GRID
param.label: Divergence
param.help: Tracing: Convergence The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: DIV_CELLS
param.label: Tracing: Max. Divergence
param.help: Tracing: Stop after x cells with divergent flow

param.name: TRACE_WEIGHT
param.label: Tracing: Weight
param.help: Tracing: Weight The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CHNLNTWRK
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CHNLNTWRK
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_CHNLROUTE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CHNLROUTE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_SHAPES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SHAPES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool derives a channel network based on gridded digital elevation data.<br/>Use the initiation options to determine under which conditions channels shall start.<br/><br/>
